title: jaganmOhananE
sahitya:
jaganmOhananE krSNa krSNa jagavam pAlipanE krSNa


anupallavi

  lOkadoLage nI shishuvAgi mUlOkavanella bAyili tOride 
AgaLa kAyuva cinnanendeniside I kuTilavanella elli kalityO ranga


caraNam    endendigu nimma guNagaLa pogaLalu indrAdigaLige aLavalla 
mandaratara shrI purandara viTTalanE ondondu Atava elli kalityO ranga
